generation_prompt:
You are an expert in Clinical information extraction. Given an audio transcript, you must extract the below structural fields from the transcript.

Return the output in the following JSON format and adhere strictly to the descriptions:

{
"age": (int) The patientâ€™s age in years.
"sex": (str) The biological sex or gender of the patient. (Eg. "male" or "female")
"chief_complaint": (str) The main symptom or reason for the clinical visit as reported by the patient
"diagnosis": (str) The suspected or confirmed diagnosis mentioned in the text
"recommended_tests": (list of str) Any diagnostic tests recommended in the transcript (Eg. blood tests, imaging, etc)
"medications": [
    {
    "name": (str) Name of the prescribed medication.
    "dose": (str) The strength or amount of the medication (Eg. "500 mg").
    "frequency": (str) How often the medication should be taken (Eg. "daily", "twice daily", etc)
    }
]
}

Below is an example of a JSON Output:
```json
    {
        "age": 32,
        "sex": "female",
        "chief_complaint": "irregular periods",
        "diagnosis": "PCOS",
        "recommended_tests": ["pelvic ultrasound", "fasting insulin"],
        "medications": [
            {
            "name": "metformin",
            "dose": "500 mg",
            "frequency": "daily"
            }
        ]
    }
```
If you don't find any of the keys, keep the values as null. Your output must be in JSON format only.
